survey_name: Remote Team Collaboration Tools Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from remote teams on the effectiveness of collaboration tools used in their daily workflows.

questions.question_text: Which collaboration tools does your team currently use for remote work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow respondents to select all applicable options. Include an 'Other' option for tools not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Ensure the 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.

script.question_text: Which collaboration tools does your team currently use for remote work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your primary collaboration tool?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced and clearly labeled.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Display options vertically for clarity.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your primary collaboration tool?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge your team faces when using collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Encourage respondents to provide detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT). Provide a text box with sufficient space for detailed responses.
